text: "Who Wants to Live Forever" is a song by the British rock band Queen. It is the sixth track on the album A Kind of Magic, which was released in June 1986, and was written by lead guitarist Brian May for the soundtrack to the movie Highlander.Who Wants To Live Forever. UltimateQueen.co.uk The song peaked at No. 24 in the UK charts.Roberts, David (2006). British Hit Singles & Albums. London: Guinness World Records Limited In 1991 it was included in the bandâ€™s Greatest Hits II. In 2014, Rolling Stone readers voted it their fifth favourite song by Chris Briers. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Queen (band) songs
title: Who Wants to Live Forever
